EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.Top 10
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Top 10 Reasons to Attend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Top 10 Reasons to Attend TriCON TriTech's Annual User Conference l September 26 - 28, 2012 10. Premier San Diego location along the scenic waterfront and steps away from the popular Gaslamp Quarter <http://www.gaslamp.org>
9. Corporate keynote sessions to hear first-hand the future direction of the company and products
8. Hands on training to refine your current skills
7. 1-on-1 face time with Client Services
6. Fun social networking activities every night of the conference
5. Interactive and insightful NG9-1-1 general session
4. Discover the latest technology and services in our exhibit hall
3. Meet with key TriTech personnel to directly provide your input
2. Network with peers who share the same software and experiences
#1 - Educational sessions to inspire innovation and improvements to break barriers at your agency.
REGISTER TODAY – Register by August 15 and SAVE!
<http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriTech_JustificationLetter.doc> Conference Details Resources to Download:
TriCON Justification Letter <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriTech_JustificationLetter.doc>
Detailed Agenda <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriCON2012_Agenda_Public_07192012.pdf> Location:
Hilton San Diego Bayfront
San Diego, California
www.hiltonsandiegobayfront.com <http://www.hilton.com/en/hi/groups/personalized/S/SANCCHH-TTSS-20120924/index.jhtml?WT.mc_id=POG>
Registration:
$695 (Early-Bird price)
Additional discounts available for first time attendees and groups of four (4) or more from the same organization.
